description: Finally, a battle strategy to get the most out of the Web’s most popular discount fashion stores.
title: Online Shopping | Time Zones, Part 2
text: At Yoox you’ll find a curated selection of fashion’s more elusive pieces, like end-of-season items, exclusive capsule collections, rare vintage collectibles and a vast array of art books. Plus, the site introduces shoppers to emerging talents by collaborating with designers, musicians, artists and actors from around the world. From $20 for an accessory to over $10,000 for a rug by Established & Sons. Great deals are sure to be had on labels like like Marni, Valentino, Alexander Wang, Raf Simons and Maison Martin Margiela. Because Yoox’s selection is constantly updated, your best bet is to search by Latest Arrivals or look in the Preview Department. Starting in August, the site will roll out all sorts of unique benefits for newsletter subscribers and Facebook friends. We recommend you sign up for both.
